title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form S-1 - Order to appear
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form S-1 - Order to appear

State Regulations
FORM S-1
ORDER TO APPEAR
STATE OF NEW YORK
SUPREME COURT COUNTY COURT
PART: ________ COUNTY: ____________
Address of Court: ____________
____________
________
IN THE MATTER
of

An Order to Appear Pursuant to
C PL 330.20 in Relation to
________
Defendant
________
IN THE NAME OF THE PEOPLE OF THE
STATE OF NEW YORK
TO: [Name of defendant] ________
AN APPLICATION having been filed with this
court by the District Attorney the Commissioner of Mental Health pursuant to
the provisions of subdivision 14 of C PL 330.20, for a recommitment order
committing you to the custody of the Commissioner of Mental Health for
confinement in a secure facility for care and treatment for six months from the
date of the order, YOU ARE HEREBY ORDERED to appear before this
court on the following date and at the following time: [Date] ____________
[Time] ____________
Following your appearance before this court, a hearing will be conducted to determine whether you have a dangerous mental
disorder, UPON YOUR FAILURE to appear at the time and
place herein mentioned, a warrant may issue to a peace officer directing that
you be taken into the custody and brought before this court. Dated: ________
____________
Justice of the Supreme Court

Judge of the County Court

This order shall be served personally upon
the above-named defendant. This order shall be mailed to the last known
address of the above-named defendant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form
S-1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
